title: Verification of content failed issue
body:
### What is the problem?

I am uploading a large 1.07 TB data set to GIN (g-node). The transfer runs and fails repeatedly. I tried changing the sibling to our local gin server, but exactly the same issue appeared. I originally thought that the problem is with the fact that the connection might have been interrupted at some point, but I have now tried it with a 26 hr non-stop upload.  

```
  verification of content failed
  verification of content failed
  verification of content failed
  verification of content failed
  verification of content failed
  verification of content failed
  verification of content failed
  verification of content failed
  verification of content failed
  verification of content failed
  verification of content failed
  verification of content failed
  verification of content failed
git-annex: copy: 108 failed
```
I am thinking that it's something with my data, but I have no idea what could be the problem. 


### What steps will reproduce the problem?

I wasn't able to replicate this in a smaller set, so I unfortunately don't have a replication route atm. 

### Datalad information

datalad 0.15.0, ubuntu 18.04.

### Additional context

_No response_

### Have you had any success using DataLad before?

Yes, I use it for smaller data sets regularly.
